entry.code: Error creating RFT Home: Failed to connect to database ... Until this is corrected all RFT request will fail and all GRAM jobs that require staging will fail

row.entry: This occurs when you start the container if RFT is not configured properly to talk to a PostgreSQL database [or other IODBC database such as MySQL? fixme].

[fixme - what about making sure the db is correctly configured?] The usual cause is that Postmaster is not accepting TCP connections, which means that you must restart Postmaster with the -i option (see Configuring RFT).
